title: Theodore Roosevelt National Park: General Management Plan
body: General Management Plan       The General Management Plan (GMP) is an important document for every National Park Service site. The 1986 Theodore Roosevelt National Park GMP provides:   Strategies to guide management, use, and development of the park A land protection plan An environmental assessment  The TRNP GMP is available for viewing online from the NDSU library in .pdf format. View the 1986 Theodore Roosevelt General Management Plan.
